title: The Future of Farming: Increasing Adoption of Conservation Practices among Alabama Row Crop Farmers

tasks.task: Participate in a grant project aimed at evaluating cover crop and irrigation system adoption and their environmental impacts.
subtasks: Understand the funding source (USTNRCS under CIG).
Assess the economic aspects of cover crop implementation.

Co-develop knowledge on sustainable production practices.

Establish learning sites for farmer-researcher collaboration.
Identify barriers to implementing cover crops and irrigation management.
Promote positive environmental impacts and cost savings for farmers.
Address societal taboos related to nutrient runoff and losses.
